title.narrative: Support for OECS policy analysis on energy resilience

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to strengthen GGGI’s relationship with OECS and accelerate investment in technologies, practices, and policies that will enable a sustainable, resilient energy system across the Eastern Caribbean States and support the achievement of NDC targets. This project is aligned to. IO1.strengthened national, sub-national, and local green growth policy planning, financing, and institutional frameworks.

Through this project, GGGI will help OECS countries: mobilize resources to support sustainable energy development; implement OECS recommendations on sustainable energy development; and understand key issues around risk related to energy resilience.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04520 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: Improved regulatory and fiscal policy frameworks at regional and country levels to increase private sector participation and investments in resilient energy infrastructure projects

description.narrative: Activity 1.1: Conduct desk review on solar PV/energy resilience insurance mechanisms and compile brief report on best practices on energy resilience insurance mechanisms. Activity 1.2: Support implementation of recommendations from the OECS studies on incorporation of RE in MSMEs and energy storage options for the OECS at a country-level. Activity 1.3: Conduct consultation with OECS and select one or two islands to adopt the regulatory and fiscal frameworks in 2020. Activity 1.4: Assess the existing OECS building code and provide recommendations for incorporating resilience of roof-mounted solar PV installations into the code Activity 1.5: Share and disseminate best practices and lessons learned at OECS/Regional workshops and events

title.narrative: 1.3: Number of member states selected and concept notes written
1.5: Number of presentations at events/workshops on best practices
Improved capacity of OECS and country governments to identify and develop energy resilience opportunities and projects

description.narrative: Activity 2.1: Support OECS in development of regional programs on GCF readiness or adaptation Activity 2.2: Support country governments in collaboration with OECS in identification of energy resilience projects, and develop the project concepts for mobilizing funding to support project development

title.narrative: Strengthen GGGI’s relationship with OECS and accelerate investment in technologies, practices, and policies that will enable a sustainable, resilient energy system across the Eastern Caribbean States and support the achievement of NDC targets.
Proposals submitted on energy resilience projects
